description:
Provides an ALIKAFKA sasl user resource.

-> **NOTE:** Available in 1.66.0+

-> **NOTE:**  Only the following regions support create alikafka sasl user.
[`cn-hangzhou`,`cn-beijing`,`cn-shenzhen`,`cn-shanghai`,`cn-qingdao`,`cn-hongkong`,`cn-huhehaote`,`cn-zhangjiakou`,`ap-southeast-1`,`ap-south-1`,`ap-southeast-5`]

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

InstanceId.description: ID of the ALIKAFKA Instance that owns the groups.

KmsEncryptedPassword.description: An KMS encrypts password used to a db account. You have to specify one of `password` and `kms_encrypted_password` fields.

KmsEncryptionContext.description: An KMS encryption context used to decrypt `kms_encrypted_password` before creating or updating a user with `kms_encrypted_password`. See [Encryption Context](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/42975.htm). It is valid when `kms_encrypted_password` is set.

Password.description: Operation password. It may consist of letters, digits, or underlines, with a length of 1 to 64 characters. You have to specify one of `password` and `kms_encrypted_password` fields.

Username.description: Username for the sasl user. The length should between 1 to 64 characters. The characters can only contain 'a'-'z', 'A'-'Z', '0'-'9', '_' and '-'.
